description: This file contains CSS styles for a theme management system, defining styles for light and dark themes as well as various components of the app.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with background and text color management.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo component with specific styling and animation.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header component of the application with layout and styling.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link component within the application with specific color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button component for toggling the theme with styles for hover and active states.
